name: Alien Abduction (johnleeroy, quira.christine, Juan C. Perez, Alexander Yaws, ETComeBack)
name_original: Alien Abduction (johnleeroy, quira.christine, Juan C. Perez, Alexander Yaws, ETComeBack)
description:
Works better as a download, rather than playing the web version! Parts of the screen are cut off!

Controls: 

Mouse: Buttons and Menus

Arrow keys to move.

Alien Abduction is a arcade-styled game featuring humans using alien technology to travel to the alien home world and abduct them and their stuff. The player controls the base of a tractor beam that picks up objects as you hover over them. The tractor beam becomes larger and more powerful as the player abducts everything on the map. Start with little alien people and benches and eventually grow strong enough to take the city in it's entirety. 

Go for the high score!
